metadata.description: Prelude to Miss Fury! When thieves steal from other thieves it always causes problems, doesn't it?  So when The Black Sparrow is hired to steal a mysterious "Moon Stone" from a museum in New York, her decision to keep the thing for a better payday annoys her former employers who then steal it back from her.  Now it's The Black Sparrow who is annoyed, and that's a dangerous thing.  All she wants is what she stole fair and square, but she needs help.  She needs The Shadow!
metadata.name: Noir
